Actions.Name: Long Arm of the Law
Actions.Effects: Ignores ranged attack penalties. Characters adjacent to the Judge in the area take double damage and are shoved 3.

Actions.Name: Lock
Actions.Effects: The judge throws a bola at a foe in range 6. That foe becomes immobile and dazed+. They can save against the bola at the end of their turn, ending both effects, or can use an action on their turn to free themselves.

Actions.Name: Stock
Actions.Effects: The judge shoves an adjacent foe 1 and deals them 2 damage, then dashes 1.
